item.title: How We Created An Ai Powered Interview System Using Openais Chatgpt
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The Idea While ChatGPT has garnered a lot of attention over the last few months, Ngoc Thanh, our senior software engineer, has been exploring how OpenAI’s API can expedite and elevate job interviews by distilling key candidate insights through an interactive chat interview.

item.title: Easy Prompt Engineering For Business Use And Mitigating Risks In Llms
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Preface At Dwarves, we’ve begun creating apps with ChatGPT for some of our clients. One common problem we face is what techniques of prompt engineering should we use for cases like avoiding political interactions and defending against data leaks.

item.title: Exploring Machine Learning Approaches For Fine Tuning Llama Models
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, we’ve been increasingly exposed to more state-of-the-art news coming from AI than ever before, of course, related to Large Language Models (LLM).

item.title: December Forward Engineering 2023
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This month, we have focused on revamping how we learn, familiarize, and work with tech. We are excited to announce that we have updated our Forward Engineering to better reflect the feedback and insights from our Labs team, Operations Team, and Consulting Team.
